One of the best movies I've seen this year.

This release crashed my computer 7 times. :-(
In the end it was more of a challenge to complete watching it than I enjoyed it.
Great picture, great sound, good movie but this release is unstable and glitchy as hell. 
Kept jumping between VLC and MPC hope that one player would survive the glitch-onslaught but no. :-(

I would NOT download this release! I guess something have gone wrong when converting it from .rar to .mkv or something. 
Hope for a proper release soon.

And by the way: This is the complete movie! The reports of "repeated scenes" are wrong! It is a time-jumping movie so some repetition is there but that is part of the movie.
So if you want to gamble that your setup can tolerate the glitches, feel free to go ahead and try.

It was a cool movie!
M-10
A-10
V-10

Audio/Video Quality: Perfect quality for 720p.  No problems.

Movie:  8.2/10

Plot was consistent and very intriguing.  However, I felt the movie would have benefited from more character development and a longer movie.  I felt not showing some failed attempts at finding the bomber took away from the story and helped take away from the entire central theme of the movie: life is priceless and you are surrounded by people with years of living, loving,  and experience each with their own story.  Giving the movie a longer length would have made a more significant impact on the audience as the audience, and the character, would learn more and more about each individual surrounding the main character.

******SPOILER ALERT*********
******SPOILER ALERT*********
******SPOILER ALERT*********
I feel the ending was very cheesy.  The central theme would be much more effective if the main character simply died instead of being alive in the source code.  I feel that director made the main character live simply to make the audience happy, which took away from the entire theme of the movie.
